resources.string: 1.Is this app really a food ordering app?
No, this app is not a real food ordering app. This App is made by Vinesh during Internshala Appathon as a Final Project.
It was Amazing. The concepts were hard but they explained it very nicely. The person who has the passion in Android App Development will definitely learn a lot of things from this training.
Itâ€™s on the Internshala website in Online trainings Section.\n Here is the link:Internshala trainings
